title: paragraph 6 of the Schedule to the State Airports Act 2004 (No. 32 of 2004)) of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Air Navigation and Transport
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Air Navigation and Transport 

(Amendment) Act 1998 (Aggregate Borrowings Limit Variation) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited air navigation transport (amendment) act 1998 (aggregate borrowing limit variation) order 2020

title: paragraph 6 of the Schedule to the State Airports Act 2004 (No. 32 of 2004)) of
heading: 2. The amount specified in paragraph (a) of section 13(5) (inserted by
text_raw:
2. The amount specified in paragraph (a) of section 13(5) (inserted by 
paragraph 6 of the Schedule to the State Airports Act 2004 (No. 32 of 2004)) of 
the Air Navigation and Transport (Amendment) Act 1998 (No. 24 of 1998) is 
varied by substituting “€2,200,000,000” for “€1,800,000,000”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Finance consents to the making of the foregoing Order. 

[456] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Finance, 

21 October, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure and Reform, 

21 October, 2020. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 October, 2020. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [456]

title: paragraph 6 of the Schedule to the State Airports Act 2004 (No. 32 of 2004)) of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for an increase, from €1.8bn to €2.2bn of the aggregate 
amount of moneys borrowed at any one time by the daa as specified in paragraph 
(a) of section 13(5) (inserted by paragraph 6 of the Schedule to the State Airports 
Act 2004 (No. 32 of 2004)) of the Air Navigation and Transport (Amendment) 
Act 1998 (No. 24 of 1998). 

 
 
 
 
 
 [456] 5
